overview: Since 1980 German institutions send teens to the south of Portugal under experimental projects of social rehabilitation. That's how Katrin comes to Alentejo. She will establish a unique relationship with the surrounding environment, a situation exacerbated by the harshness of the landscape and the emptiness of a socially desertified region.  Katrin, twith Julia and Pedro, will build a refuge in a no-man's-land...
title: Body Rice
